GetBackgroundColor.description: DPANEL [Client] Returns the panel's background color.

SetBackgroundColor.description:
DPANEL [Client] Sets the background color of the panel.

[table] color
  The background color.

SetDisabled.description:
DPANEL [Client] 

[boolean] disabled
  True to disable the panel (mouse input disabled and background alpha set to 75), false to enable it (mouse input enabled and background alpha set to 255).

SetDrawBackground.description:
DPANEL [Client] 

[boolean] draw
  True to show the panel's background, false to hide it.

SetPaintBackground.description:
DPANEL [Client] 

[boolean] paint
  True to show the panel's background, false to hide it.
